commitResults.messageTitle: Deploy portfolio on netlify (#2593)
Remove parallel flag from test scripts (#2647)

commitResults.messageBody:
* Fix uncaught exception bug

* Update error message for beginner friendliness

commitResults.messageTitle: Add code highlighting based on absolute positions (#2584)
commitResults.messageBody:
Add code highlighting based on absolute positions

Currently, there is no way to include highlighting of leading
whitespace when using the highlight-lines attribute. Providing such
an option may be beneficial to users, giving them more freedom
when using MarkBind.

commitResults.messageTitle: Migrate filterIconAssets.test.js to TypeScript (#2637)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Rename packages\core\test\unit\Page\filterIconAssets.test.js to TypeScript

* Adapt packages\core\test\unit\Page\filterIconAssets.test.js to TypeScript

commitResults.messageTitle: Add custom host validation (#2599)
commitResults.messageBody:
Currently, the validity check comes after the IP
zero check. The IP zero check flags some invalid
IPs, ,like `0`. This results in the following
scenario for a user:

1. User enters `0` as the IP
2. User gets a warning that the address `0.0.0.0`
has security risks
3. User proceeds by entering 'y'
4. User gets an error that the IP is invalid

This may be confusing for the user, who gets a
warning for their address, only to find out that
it's invalid. This commit moves the validity check
to earlier in the code, so that the user gets the
error message first and that the zero IP regex
check is not run on invalid IPs.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix issues with MarkBind's patch of live-server (#2621)
commitResults.messageBody:
Currently, there are a few issues regarding MarkBind's patch of
`live-server` in `packages\cli\src\lib\live-server\index.js`. The issues
are:
1. Opening an invalid URL for IPv6 addresses
2. Opening the wrong URL when attempting to serve on an
    unavailable address.
3. Missing `CHANGED` comments in our patch
4. Missing warning when user serves on `::`
5. Missing patch for `live-server` code to log available IPv6 addresses

Fixes include:
- Wrapping IPv6 addresses in square brackets `[]` to form valid URLs.
- Explicitly reassigning `host` when the provided address is
   unavailable.
- Adding the missing `CHANGED` comments.
- Updating the zero address check to include IPv6's zero address.
- Updating logging to include available IPv6 addresses for `::`.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor isValidHost and resolve Codecov issue (#2656)
Update config files to prevent duplicated JavaScript tests (#2638)
Update Developer Guide on Codecov for PR Review (#2659)
Refactor codeBlockButton Plugins (#2625)
commitResults.messageBody:
Refactored logic to insert plugin buttons only if
pre element contains the code element as per CommonMark
spec for fenced code blocks. Scoped CSS rules for pre element
to minimize side effects. Modularized previously global button
CSS rules to be included only if plugin is enabled.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Mermaid script for efficiency and decouple from Vue (#2614)
commitResults.messageBody:
Update Mermaid Plugin

Dynamically load Mermaid js asset only if diagrams present.
Decouple rendering of mermaid diagrams from Vue directives.
Instead, use MutationObservers to load dynamically added
diagrams that may be introduced by components such as
includes or panels.

Standardise format of mermaid node transformation to
align with native mermaid formatting. This allows use of
standard mermaid format in markdown files.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor dataTable plugin to decouple from Vue (#2626)
commitResults.messageBody:
Refactor dataTable plugin

Decouple dataTable from Vue by using MutationObserver instead
of relying on Vue Directives to process dynamically loaded content.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Core-Web Documentation (#2660)
commitResults.messageBody:
Updated documentation under Design/ProjectStructure
for core-web library to better explain the library
especially for unfamiliar new developers.

Enhance clarity while keeping a high-level overview.

commitResults.messageTitle: Migrate from Vue 2 to Vue 3 (#2622)
commitResults.messageBody:
Migrate from Vue 2 to Vue 3

Vue 2 has reached end-of-life in 2023, limiting maintainability,
extensibility of MarkBind. This commit migrates the codebase
(core, CLI, and vue-components) to Vue 3.3.11.

The migration includes major updates to server-side rendering
logic, hydration, component syntax, bundling setup (Webpack),
and test configurations. Vue 2 dependencies and deprecated
APIs have been replaced accordingly. Snapshot tests and test
site output have also been updated to reflect new Vue version.

This migration improves future extensibility and compatibility
with modern tooling and Vue ecosystem packages.

commitResults.messageTitle: Copy button becomes tick when clicked (#2580)
Remove PR message workflow check for bots (#2598)
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, adding a new contributor triggers a PR message workflow to
check for PR messages. By default, no PR message is added by the bot.

Removing the check for PR messages for bots will likely not affect any
essential checks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add MCQ question with multiple correct answers to UG (#2591)
commitResults.messageBody:
MCQ questions allow for more than one correct answer. Leaving it as
a tip is ambiguous and can cause confusion to users.

A separate question is added to show users how it can be done.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix incorrect display for annotation labels (#2586)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Fix broken annotation label

* Update annotation label and header

Previously adding a legend to an annotated image does not produce the
legend correctly. Label and headers are missing.

Header and labels now correctly displays as legends following some
guidelines:
1. When label is unspecified, the legend will not show.
2. If legend option are not either "both" or "bottom", legend will not
show.
3. If only label is specified, the label along with its content will be
shown.

* Update style

* Improve code readability

* Add code comments

* Update documentation

* Update image annotation cursor to pointer on hover
